description: This file contains React hooks for sorting and filtering device lists, including useSort and useFilter functions that manage sort and filter state and behaviors.

methods.name: useSort(items, defaultKey = 'name')
methods.description: Hook to sort an array of items based on a specified key. Returns sorted items, current sort key, and setter for sort key.

methods.name: useFilter(items)
methods.description: Hook to filter an array of items based on type and status. Returns filtered items, current filter values, and their setters.
